title: At Lyman direction Russian army shelled Bilohorivka, Nevske of Luhansk region and Serebryanske forestry. Russian aviation con...
content: At Lyman direction Russian army shelled Bilohorivka, Nevske of Luhansk region and Serebryanske forestry. Russian aviation conducted airstrikes at Izumske of Kharkiv region, Novoyehorivka of Luhansk region and Yampolivka of Donetsk region, - General Staff of Armed Forces of Ukraine says in the evening report
author: Live UA Map
